name: S2019 No Cheating Zone
description:
Background

You are the proctor of this exam. You want to make this exam fair for every student. No cheating is allowed! Some students may forget to bring their pencils, so borrowing pencils is an allowed behavior. However, the cheatsheet and the calculator are not allowed to pass around the classroom. During the exam, students will ask you questions. Make sure you give them appropriate answers. 

Instruction

  • Use WASD to walk toward the student who has the question.
  • Use left mouse button to catch the cheatsheet, calculator or pencil.
